duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, repair, upgrade, and perform preventative maintenance on specified Carl Zeiss Meditec instrumentation in a designated field service territory.
Complete work assignments and submit field service reports according to company guidelines.
Maintain spare parts inventory and interface with customers in a professional manner.
Diagnose and repair all designated products within an assigned service territory, including preventative maintenance, installations, and upgrades per specific training and manuals.
Instruct customers on operation and maintenance of equipment and maintain company-issued test equipment and support tools.

education_certification.credential: BS degree in Electronics, Engineering, Computer Technology, or related fields preferred.
